string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a brightly smiling sun floating over you. On the KeyConfig, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a brightly smiling moon floating around in a sea of stars over you. On the KeyConfig, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a rainbow in its full 7 colors floating next to you. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see Lilly the cute little devil floating around next to you. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that shows a submarine under the water. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays the longing to be with someone special. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely effect that shows a baby angel floating around as your protector. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being wanted around the world. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect used to increase the chance of winning with Slot Machine by 2x. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that appears Chinese Falg. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see two babies floating on the cloud as a sign of friendship. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays that the owner would like to be left alone. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special equalizer effect that is given as a prize at the Maple Member Shop. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect of the fireworks that is given as a prize at the Maple Member Shop. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays the stormy cloud with rain and lightning hovering around the owner's head. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect used to increase the number of balls obtained from winning with Slot Machine by 2x. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A siren effect that can be used under emergencies. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special star effect for a special day. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: A smile effect best used when you're in a great mood! Designate a a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: A heart effect you can use to show your love to the others. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that follows your character for the supporting of Korea's victory. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: This skull was found somewhere around the remains, and it'll be with you until you wish for otherwise. Double-click on the item or on the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A number of twinkling stars surrounds the character in this special effect.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that captures the feeling of wanting to express the feeling of love to someone special. Double-click on the item or on the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A family of toy ducks follow around the character. Double-click on the item or on the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a spooky ghost appirate behind you and scare the daylights out of everyone nearby! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a horde of Dracula's finest bats appear and surround your character with alluring nocturne ambience. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that perfectly represents the feeling of anger. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is an effect item that exudes an aura around the character. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is an effect item that exudes an aura around the character. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is an effect item that exudes an aura around the character. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: Show the world how much you adore your boyfriend with this attractive marker! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: Show the world how much you adore your girlfriend with this attractive marker! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect perfect for instances where you were caught off-guard. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you ever felt like becoming a Christmas Tree, here's your chance! On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: On a cold, snowy day, this effect will enable you to become a snowman. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that pours massive amount of water on top of the head. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that features a spotlight above the head of the character. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that follows the character around which can be used to express the feeling of happiness and joy. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A very busy bee that's never distracted from following you. Keeps one focused on the task at hand.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that features a blinding glow on the character's eyes. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: Traces of the character remains while the character moves, creating multiple images of the character in the process. Double-click on the icon, or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays the lightning striking on the character's head. Double-click on the icon or designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being Maple Champion around the world. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being Maple Champion around the world. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that puts a poster in front of your face as if you're being Maple Champion around the world. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: Celebrate your holiday cheer with this effect! Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: Give Santa a lift with this hilarious effect! Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: Create the perfect excuse for a holiday kiss! Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that displays Santa and his two trusty reindeers breaking down to the beat, hovering around the owner's head. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that features a UFO and a number of colorful aliens accompanying the owner of the item. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that features a trail of flowers and grass left behind by the owner of the item. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that shows a cute fairy sprinkling flowers. On the Key Config, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: Not sold in Cash Shop. An effect shown while changing into a monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cool blue water balloon. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the water balloon effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nicely-folded paper plane. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the paper plane effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ball of concentrated energy. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the energy effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red starfish that can be seen at the beach. Can be equipped with a #cthrowing star# to have the starfish effect.\n\nThis item cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A baseball with small wings attached to it. Can be equipped with a #cthrowing star# to have the winged baseball effect.\n\nThis item cannot be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: The official football of the MapleBowl. When held in your inventory, #cthrowing stars# will appear as a thrown football.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chalkboard eraser commonly found in classrooms. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the eraser effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small pink heart of love that explodes on contact. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the heart effect. \n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable brown teddy bear that explodes on contact. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the teddy bear effect. \n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Never in Pepe's wildest dreams did it think it'd be chucked down the field in place of the throwing star. Thrown with a throwing star to have the Pepe effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A throwing star make to look like Mr. Puff, with its huffy puffy cheeks resembling that of a tasty-looking steamed bun. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the Mr. Puff effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted skull straight from the Headless Horseman. Thrown with a throwing star to have the skull striker effect. Item cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Harmless pie? Think again. Thrown with a throwing star to have the pumpkin bomb effect.

string.name: desc
string.value: An explosive bomb used by the legendary pirates. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the explosive bomb effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: That nasty poop can be detected from afar. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the nasty poop effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A white egg thrown in place of the throwing star, and that explodes on contact. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the Chick effect. \n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mischievous ball that has gained sentience, and now lives to be thrown for massive damage. Tremendous striking power! Equips over #cThrowing Stars#!

string.name: desc
string.value: An explosive throwing star used by the Dragon. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the explosive bomb effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Beautiful shooting star. Mask over #cThrowing Star#.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Explosive throwing stars from New Leaf City. They're the Bomb! This item equips over #cThrowing Stars#!

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute and cuddly sheep. Don't let it fool you--it's lethal. This item equips over #cThrowing Stars#!

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Elf, working as the Hired Merchant, will sell the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Elf, working as the Hired Merchant, will sell the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Coffeehouse, doubling as the Hired Merchant, will be a place that sells the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game. #cIf an item is sold, the owner will be notified through the chat window.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Coffeehouse, doubling as the Hired Merchant, will be a place that sells the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game. #cIf an item is sold, the owner will be notified through the chat window.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Granny, working as the Hired Merchant, will sell the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game.

string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Granny, working as the Hired Merchant, will sell the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game.

string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Granny, working as the Hired Merchant, will sell the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world. This item cannot be used to teleport in between continents.

string.name: desc
string.value: By drinking sweet refreshing #cCoca-Cola#, it ables you to #cteleport to one of the remembered maps#. You can also #cteleport to the map where specific character is located# in the same channel. Unable the teleport to the maps where teleport is limited.

string.name: desc
string.value: This Teleport Rock enables one to #cteleport between continents#. It also enables the user to teleport to a specific character from the same channel. Up to #c10# maps, excluding the maps that cannot be reached through teleport, can be registered for this.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the #cscroll that allows you to reset 1 AP from the ability stat#. Choose one AP from HP, MP, STR, DEX, INT, or LUK , and allocate it to the desired category. The lowest an AP level can reach on any category is 4.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 1st-job skill#. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 2nd or 3rd job skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 2nd-level skill#. The 1st job SP raised AFTER the 2nd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 2nd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 3rd job skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 3rd-level skill#. The 1st & 2nd job SP raised AFTER the 3rd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 2nd job skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 4th-level skill#. The 1st, 2nd, and 3rd job SP raised AFTER the 4th job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st, 2nd or 3rd job skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: This will enable the owner of the weapon to engrave his/her name on an equipment item once. Click on the item, and drag the item #con top of the equipment of choice# to engrave your character name on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lock that seals away any equipment items and throwing stars, excluding the quest items. By sealing the item away, the item will be #cdisabled from selling, trading, or throwing away#. Double-click on the lock to seal an item.

string.name: desc
string.value: An equipment needed to open the #ceggs from pigme#. Pigme eggs canve incubated by double clicking the incubator.

string.name: desc
string.value: A guard for sealing an equip item and/or throwing star to prevent #cselling, trading or dropping# of the item. Double-click on the guard, then seal the item into the window that appears. #cThis Item Guard is active for 7 days, after which the item will be automatically released from the seal.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A guard for sealing an equip item and/or throwing star to prevent #cselling, trading or dropping# of the item. Double-click on the guard, then seal the item into the window that appears. #cThis Item Guard is active for 30 days, after which the item will be automatically released from the seal.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A guard for sealing an equip item and/or throwing star to prevent #cselling, trading or dropping# of the item. Double-click on the guard, then seal the item into the window that appears. #cThis Item Guard is active for 90 days, after which the item will be automatically released from the seal.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the map your character is on with this megaphone.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the map your character is on with this megaphone. Only available for characters that are over Level 10.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Only available for characters that are over Level 10.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. (Heart accents)

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. (Skull accents)

string.name: desc
string.value: Show your avatar on Maple TV with messages.\nIn case of dedication messages, character you have designated will also appear on the screen throughout the entire world. The message will last appx. 15 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Beautifully designed TV with star effects. \nThis allows you to type in longer messages with longer period of time, 30 seconds. Only announcement type of message is available with this item. The message will last for 30 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Beautifully designed TV with Heart effect.\nPropose in style on the TV. This item only allows dedication type of message where designated user also appears on the TV. The message will last for 1 minute.

string.name: desc
string.value: Show your message on the chatting window as well as Maple TV at the same time.

string.name: desc
string.value: Show your message on the chatting window as well as Maple TV at the same time. This comes with star effect on the Maple TV.

string.name: desc
string.value: Show your message on the chatting window as well as Maple TV at the same time. This comes with heart effect on the Maple TV.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this megaphone to broadcast to everyone your World about an item that may be for sale.

string.name: desc
string.value: A kite that you can float around the skies at will. Enter your own message.

string.name: msg
string.value: is wishing you a happy new year.

string.name: msgIn
string.value: Enter a congratulatory message.(You can write on every line.)

string.value: Double-click to send a note to an offline character. The receiver will be able to see the note at the next login.

string.name: desc
string.value: It does not let the user lose EXP points after death, as long as it's in possession. 30% of your HP and MP will be recovered when you are revived.

string.name: desc
string.value: Open a regular store. Can open anywhere of choice in the free market. Can sell up to 16 items at once.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special-edition coupon that opens a sky blue tree store. Can open anywhere of choice in the free market and sell up to 24 items at once. Available for a limited time only.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display the throwing up motion.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display panicking face.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display the happy face.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display kissing face.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display lovely wink.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure it on a button of your choice, and the character will make the face of pain and sorrow.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display sparkling eyes.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display the look of rage.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display beaming eyes.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display the look of “awesome!!!”

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display the look of being flustered.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character display the thinking look.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character act like falling asleep.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character act very surprised.

string.name: desc
string.value: On the KeyConfig, configure this expression on a button of your choice. Press the button and watch your character act very surprised.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this item to name your pet. Call its name before making an order, and the pet responds much better to your command. \n ex) Lucky, sit!

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious water gathered from the deepest valleys of Ellinia. Double click the Water of Life to reawaken your pet, which has turned into a doll.

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds the item pick-up skill to a pet. \n#cAvailable to pets that can only pick up Mesos.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds to automatic potion-feeding skill to the pet. \n#cAvailable to all pets that do not have this option.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to expand the pet's moving range by 3 times. \n#cOnly available to pets that have automatic pick-up skills, cannot be used on top of each other.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A skill that enables pets to pick up items and mesos within the area without the character having to move. \n#cAvailable to pets with Mesos pick-up, item pick-up skills.#

string.name: name
string.value: (+) Pick up Leftover Item & Meso Skills

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds the skill that enables pets to pick up mesos and items that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds, thus rendering it as leftovers.\n#cAvailable to pets that have Meso pick-up skills as well as item pick-up skills.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The skill that makes pet not picking up any selected item. \n#s only pet mounted meso or item collecting function can use the skill.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The skill that automatically recharges one's MP provided you have set the option up in the system option. \n#c The skill applies to all pet that does not have the skillt#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable the pet from automatically feeding the character when the HP reaches critical stage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to return the range of pet's movement back to normal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items and mesos.

string.name: name
string.value: (-) Delete Pick up Leftover Item & Meso

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable pets from picking up leftover items and mesos, the ones that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains quite a bit of mesos. User must be above level 15 to purchase sacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains a lot of mesos. User must be above level 15 to purchase sacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains lots and lots of mesos. User must be above level 15 to purchase sacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: This ticket will enable you to use Gachapon and obtain various items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket needed to enter the event map.

string.name: desc
string.value: This ticket allows you to shop certain items in the cash shop regardless of price.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tasty-looking monkey banana. Only edible for the pet Monkey. \nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fresh set of batteries. Only usable with the pet Robot.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A neatly-packaged dog bone. Only edible for the pet Puppy and Husky.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bamboo harvested from Ellinia forests. Only edible for the pet Panda.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Just caught at Lith Harbor. Only edible for the pet Kitty, Black Pig and Penguin.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A freshly-plucked clover. Only edible for the pet Bunny, Black Pig, and Rudolph.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fresh red meat bought from the market. Only edible for the pet Dino, Mini Kargo, Black Pig, Orange Tiger and White Tiger.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A frozen fruit that can only be eaten by #cMini Yeti and Black Pig#. Restores fullness and #cincreases closeness by 100#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nicely packed Turkey Feed. Only eligible for the pet Turkey.

string.name: desc
string.value: A large piece of Purple Heart Meat Pudding that can only be eaten by #cJr. Balrog#. Recovers "fullness" completely and #cincreases closeness by 100#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Delicious chocolate covered with Golden cover. Only edible for the pet Golden Pig.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pet food designated for Pet Sun Wu Kong. Fullness 100% & Closeness +100

string.name: desc
string.value: A pet food designated for Dragons. Fullness 100% & Closeness +100

string.name: desc
string.value: A large piece of Caramel Beetle that can only be eaten by #cJr. Reaper#. Recovers "fullness" completely and #cincreases closeness by 100#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Crispy-Salty looking bag of Chips. Only edible for the pet Porcupine. \nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tasty icicle that can only be consumed by #cSnowman and Crystal Rudolph#. Recovers entire Fullness and #cincreases 100 Closeness#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nutritious food only available for #cKino#. Restores Fullness and #cincreases 100 Closeness#..

string.name: desc
string.value: Only eligible for the pet Skunk. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ticket to have a wedding at the Cathedral w/ invitations

string.name: desc
string.value: Ticket to have a wedding at the Vegas Chapel w/ invitations

string.name: desc
string.value: Chapel wedding ticket that includes invitations and a special wedding event.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cathedral wedding ticket that includes invitations and a special wedding event.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ticket that lets you make additional invitation cards.(one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that shows Passed Gas. Double-click to use this effect one time only!

string.value: At last, your desire to transform into a mushroom can be fulfilled. Disguise yourself for 10 minutes and surpirse your friends!

string.name: desc
string.value: Endulge yourself with this phat pig costume. 10 minutes of gluttony has never been so fun!

string.name: desc
string.value: Become a terifying Space Monster with this costume. Scare your friends out of this world for 10 minutes!

string.name: desc
string.value: This ticket enables one to send a package, along with an entered message, #cRIGHT THEN AND THERE#. #cDouble-click# it or visit the #cPackage NPC# to use this.

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available for 24 hours upon purchase.

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 07 pm to 11 pm (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 12 am to 04 am (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 03 am to 07 am (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The Double Drop card is immediately activated upon purchase and the double drop effect will be available from 06 am to 10 am (Pacific time) #ceveryday#.

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon #cdoubles the amount of mesos and doubles the rate of items# dropped from monsters. The coupon will be immediately activated after purchase and the double drop effect will be available for 4 hour upon purchase.

string.name: desc
string.value: Any information entered will be featured on the chalkboard. The item can be used anywhere including #cFree Market Entrance# except for #cFree Market#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Any information entered will be featured on the chalkboard. The item can be used anywhere including #cFree Market Entrance# except for #cFree Market#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious rock that enables baby Evolving Pets to grow into full-fledged adult Evolving Pets.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a burning background for your avatar.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a bright background for your avatar.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a heart background for your avatar.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll will enable you to change your character name to something totally new! Please be aware that the character must be at level 10 or higher to be eligible for the name change and the new name should be an acceptable new name that has passed the name check. The name-change will occur during the following server check, and you will then be restricted from changing names for one month.

string.name: desc
string.value: This item is used to transfer your character from one game world server to another. Your character must be at least Level 20, and only up to 1,000,000 mesos will be transferred with the character.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cAmoria Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cNLC Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cHenesys Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cKerning City Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cOrbis Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cLudibrium Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cMu Lung Hair Salon# to change your hair to a style of #cyour choice#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the character creation slot by 1. Each account may hold a maximum of 6 character slots per server world.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c*Warning: If you do not have an empty Character slot, it cannot be used.#

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world.You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status#.

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c*Warning : If all 12 character slots are full, it cannot be used.#

This package has the #cMaple Life item plus an Extra Character Slot coupon.#Using this item will automiatically create a new slot.

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world. You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status.#

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to experience the same effect as entering a general store. Can purchase potions to recover HP & MP, throwing stars, and recharge bullets. Some maps restrict the use of this item, though.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Pet Snack is secret method of handling multiple pets at once.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can control the Hired Merchant anywhere, as long as the merchant is on the same channel.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cCBD Hair Salon# to change your hair style #crandomly#. (one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cCBD Hair Salon# to change your hair style to a style of #cyour choice#. (one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cCBD Plastic Surgery# to change your face #crandomly#. (one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cCBD Plastic Surgery# to change your face to a style of #cyour choice#. (one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cCBD Plastic Surgery# to change your eye color #crandomly#. (one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cCBD Plastic Surgery# to change your eye to a color of #cyour choice#. (one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cCBD Skin-Care# to change your skin to a color of #cyour choice#. (one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it at #cCBD Hair Salon# to change your hair color #crandomly#. (one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it on #cCBD Hair Salon# to change your hair to a color of #cyour choice#. (one-time use)

string.name: desc
string.value: Stirgeman's favorite throwing star! Guaranteed to get you out of a tight spot!

string.name: desc
string.value: Blaze a trail of dark energy--no one can escape your wrath with this effect!

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that's required to enter the Mini Dungeon during the event period. Without this, you won't be able to fully participate in the event.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take this Master Key to open the Gold Gachapon Box and earn a rare item!

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon allows users to earn #c2x Exp (double experience)#. The coupon will be activated immediately after receiving it, and the double experience effect will be available for 90 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tis' the season to be jolly fa la la la la la la la! Sing to everyone in Maple with the carolers!

string.name: desc
string.value: A slice of freshly baked bread that can only be eaten by #cWhite Duck#. Recovers "fullness" completely and #cincreases closeness by 100#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enter a message of your choice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Show your Valentine's Day spirit with the Ace of Hearts!

string.name: desc
string.value: This ticket allows you to enter the Treasure Dungeon.

string.name: desc
string.value: This allows three lines of text to be heard throughout the world your character is currently in.

string.name: desc
string.value: 맵에 속한 캐릭터의 물리공격력 +20, 마법공격력 +30 을 15분간 상승시켜준다. 원하는 메세지를 입력할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 장착 중인 유효기간이 있는 장비에 주문서처럼 드래그앤 드롭하여 사용하면, 유효기간이 #c1일# 늘어나게 된다. #c캐시아이템에는 사용할 수 없으며. 오늘부터 30일 이상으로는 늘릴 수 없다#

string.name: desc
string.value: This item revives characters in the same map where they have died. However, it cannot be used in some PQs, Event Maps, and Transportation (i.e. ship).

string.name: desc
string.value: This cuts the ties that bind an item to its master, allowing you to trade once. Applicable to only certain items.

string.name: desc
string.value: This ticket will enable you to use the Gachapon of any town without having to travel to the actual location.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take this Master Key to open the Silver Gachapon Box and earn a rare item!

string.name: desc
string.value: It's raining cats and dogs!!! Enter a message of your choice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be equipped with a #cthrowing star#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temper the equipped item with Vicious' Hammer to increase available upgrade by 1. It can be used maximum 2 times per item. Warning: You cannot use it on the Horntail Necklace.

string.name: desc
string.value: Who knows? Perhaps you'll flutter away with these wings on your back!

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that has the magic power to release the seal on the Miwok Artifact. The scroll is written in ancient tribal language, so you need NPC Toh Reliseeker's help if you wish to use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Who knows? Perhaps you'll flutter away with these wings on your back!

string.name: desc
string.value: This item allows characters to equip 1 more Pendant than is normally allowed for 30 days. #cHowever, characters will not be able to equip more than 1 Special Equipment Item#

string.name: desc
string.value: A guard for sealing an equip item and/or throwing star to prevent #cselling, trading or dropping# of the item. Double-click on the guard, then seal the item into the window that appears. #cThis Item Guard is active for 365 days, after which the item will be automatically released from the seal.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Get a random Cash Shop item when you open this box. Test your luck! After purchasing this item, open the box by double-clicking it in the Cash Inventory. Please keep in mind that you'll only be able to open the box in the Cash Inventory.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean's favorite Drumstick. Only available for Pink Bean.

string.name: desc
string.value: Thrown with a #cthrowing star#.Item cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Spaceship that is used when rescuing Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Witch Tower hints of danger.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag and drop this onto a piece of equipment that has a time limit to extend the time limit by #c7days#. #This cannot be used on cash items, and the time limit cannot be extended past 30 days, starting from today.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag and drop this onto a piece of equipment that has a time limit to extend the time limit by #c20days#. #This cannot be used on cash items, and the time limit cannot be extended past 30 days, starting from today.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to exchange it with DS Eggs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take this Premium Master Key to open the Premium Gold Box and earn a rare item!

string.name: desc
string.value: Take this Premium Master Key to open the Premium Silver Box and earn a rare item!

string.name: desc
string.value: Take this coupon to the #cBig Headward of Henesys Hair Salon#, and you'll be able to change to a royal hairstyle of your liking.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pair of wings that resembles the wings of a forest fairy.

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon allows users to earn #c3x Exp (triple experience)#. The coupon will be activated immediately after purchase, and the triple experience effect will be available for 2 hour upon purchase.

string.name: desc
string.value: This winning spell from Vega enables a 30% success rate on a 10% scroll. Please check the scroll description to confirm that Vega's Spell is available for the scroll you choose.

string.name: desc
string.value: This winning spell from Vega enables a 90% success rate on a 60% scroll. Please check the scroll description to confirm that Vega's Spell is available for the scroll you choose.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can equip items that are 5 levels above your current level.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift box that can be freely thrown around. Using the #cThrowing Star# will create an orbital effect.\n\nThis item cannot be deleted.

string.name: desc
string.value: Well, lookie here. Someone’s certainly become popular with the guys. Turn this effect on and off by assigning it to a shortcut key from the keyboard settings menu.

string.name: desc
string.value: Well, lookie here. Someone’s certainly become popular with the girls. Turn this effect on and off by assigning it to a shortcut key from the keyboard settings menu.

string.name: desc
string.value: A drumstick that can be consumed only by #cBaby Tiger#. It recovers hunger and #cincreases Closeness by 100.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a tiger background for your avatar.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the world your character is on with this megaphone. Now available with your avatar on the top of everyone's screen! Comes with a screen shaked.

string.name: desc
string.value: Meatballs will drop from the sky in the map your character is in for 30 seconds.
